menu.name: Artists
menu.menudata: select genres.id,genres.name from genres,tracks,genre_track where tracks.audio=1 and tracks.id=genre_track.track and genre_track.genre=genres.id group by genres.id order by genres.namesort asc

menu.name: Albums
menu.menudata: select contributors.id,contributors.name from contributors,tracks,contributor_track,genre_track where tracks.audio=1 and tracks.id=contributor_track.track and contributor_track.contributor=contributors.id and tracks.id=genre_track.track and genre_track.genre={genre} group by contributors.id order by contributors.namesort asc

menu.name: Songs
menu.menudata: select albums.id,albums.title from tracks,contributor_track,albums,genre_track where tracks.audio=1 and albums.id=tracks.album and tracks.id=contributor_track.track and contributor_track.contributor={artist} and tracks.id=genre_track.track and genre_track.genre={genre} group by albums.id order by albums.titlesort

select tracks.id,tracks.title from tracks,contributor_track,albums,genre_track where tracks.audio=1 and contributor_track.track=tracks.id and tracks.album={album} and contributor_track.contributor={artist} and tracks.id=genre_track.track and genre_track.genre={genre} group by tracks.id order by tracks.tracknum asc,tracks.titlesort asc
